word_mean: 抗血清：含一种或多种抗体的血清。得自经注射抗原产生免疫的动物，或感染了含有该抗原微生物的动物。抗血清可以是单价的(对一种抗原有特异性)，或者是多价的(对一种以上的抗原有特异性)

sentence.Network_en: The titer of antiserum was detected by immunoelectrophoresis and double immunodiffusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 利用免疫电泳、向琼脂扩散试验分析和测定抗血清的效价.

sentence.Network_en: Detect the tetanus antiserum units of immunized animals by indirect hemagglutination assay.
sentence.Network_cn: 用间接血凝实验检测免疫动物血清中的破伤风抗体单位.

sentence.Network_en: Antiserum and immunoglobulin of rabies have been purified continually.
sentence.Network_cn: 抗狂犬病血清及免疫球蛋白不断得到纯化.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... antisepticize 防腐 antiserum 抗血清 antisexist 反性别歧视.
电化学专业英语翻译 ...抗血清；免疫血清 antiserum反遮蔽因子 antishielding factor

means.word_mean: 1. blood serum containing antibodies against specific antigens; provides immunity to a disease
